scripts.delete:reports: (if exist cypress\results (rmdir /Q /S cypress\results)) && mkdir cypress\results && mkdir cypress\results\junit  &&  mkdir cypress\results\mochawesome
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cy:run: npm run prereport && npx cypress run
